Theraflix is the go-to app to improve your psychosocial skills.

When youâ€™re dealing with strong emotions, you can watch a podcast or a movie clip to clear your mind and refocus. 

And when your thoughts are getting hard to track, you can write them down and reflect on them later.

Using Theraflix means you'll gradually increase your introspection level, resulting in more authenticity and enhanced psychosocial skills.
